divs: Sighting DetailsMy self and my partner were at the Spanish Portugese border very high up we saw an aircraft doing a figure eight shape with its Jet stream...it then broke off and did a heart shape....but also this was not a commercial craft ...and if military it did a sharpe right turn witwas h its jetstream...then just disappeared was this a UFO?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Faro
There were no other sightings in Faro on or around December 4th 2007
